means: 估价( value的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Why were spices so highly valued in late 15th-century Europe?
sentence.Network_cn: 为什么香料在15世纪末期的欧洲如此贵重？

sentence.Network_en: Individuality is a valued and inherent part of the British character.
sentence.Network_cn: 个性鲜明是英国人固有的、也是他们看重的特点。

sentence.Network_en: The metal had been valued at twice or thrice its current price.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种金属以前的估价是目前价格的两到三倍。

价值工程（value engineering）（Value Engineering）是在产品开发设计阶段即进行的价值与成本革新活动，因为仍在工程设计阶段，故称为价值工程（value engineering）；而 …
价值链（value chain）是一个商业体系，用来详细描述企业营运或功能行为的顺序。例如，下图用价值链中的各个环节描述了一件产 …

entry.def: The value of something such as a quality, attitude, or method is its importance or usefulness. If you place a particular value on something, that is the importance or usefulness you think it has.

example.ex: The value of this work experience should not be underestimated...
example.tran: 这种工作经验的重要性不应该被低估。

example.ex: Further studies will be needed to see if these therapies have any value...
example.tran: 这些治疗是否有效需要进行进一步的研究。

entry.def: If you value something or someone, you think that they are important and you appreciate them.

example.ex: I've done business with Mr Weston before. I value the work he gives me...
example.tran: 我以前和韦斯顿先生有过业务往来，我很重视他给我的业务。

example.ex: If you value your health then you'll start being a little kinder to yourself.
example.tran: 如果你重视自己的健康，你就要开始对自己好一点。

entry.def: The value of something is how much money it is worth.

example.ex: The value of his investment has risen by more than $50,000...
example.tran: 他投入的资本已经增值了5万多美元。

example.ex: The company's market value rose to $5.5 billion...
example.tran: 该公司的市值涨到了55亿美元。

entry.def: When experts value something, they decide how much money it is worth.

example.ex: Your lender will then send their own surveyor to value the property...
example.tran: 然后贷款方会派他们自己的评估员来对房产进行估价。

example.ex: I asked him if he would have my jewellery valued for insurance purposes...
example.tran: 我问他能否给我的珠宝进行保险估价。

entry.def: You use value in certain expressions to say whether something is worth the money that it costs. For example, if something is or gives good value, it is worth the money that it costs.

example.ex: The restaurant is informal, stylish and extremely good value...
example.tran: 这家餐厅氛围轻松，装修雅致，而且价格非常公道。

example.ex: Both offer excellent value at around £90 for a double room...
example.tran: 两家的双人客房都报出了大约90英镑的超值价格。

entry.def: The values of a person or group are the moral principles and beliefs that they think are important.

example.ex: The countries of South Asia also share many common values...
example.tran: 南亚各国也有许多相同的价值观。

example.ex: The Health Secretary called for a return to traditional family values.
example.tran: 卫生部部长呼吁传统家庭价值观的回归。

entry.tran: 重要特点，显著特点（用于其他名词后）
entry.def: Value is used after another noun when mentioning an important or noticeable feature about something.

example.ex: The script has lost all of its shock value over the intervening 24 years...
example.tran: 时隔24年后，这个剧本已经完全失去了震撼力。

example.ex: Having a mid-morning party certainly adds novelty value.
example.tran: 在上午10点左右开派对一定会增加新鲜感。

entry.def: A value is a particular number or quantity that can replace a symbol such as 'x' or 'y' in a mathematical expression.

means.word_mean: 1. (usually used in combination) having value of a specified kind;
2. held in great esteem for admirable qualities especially of an intrinsic nature;

auth_sentence.content: Valued elders no longer just disappeared into the void.
auth_sentence.res_content: Valued elders no longer just disappeared into the void.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Valued elders no longer just disappeared into the void.

auth_sentence.content: They did not create any saleable or valued product.
auth_sentence.res_content: They did not create any saleable or valued product.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They did not create any saleable or valued product.

auth_sentence.content: In other words, creativity was not valued.
auth_sentence.res_content: In other words, creativity was not valued.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In other words, creativity was not valued.

Sentence.sentence: But if your bond is highly valued by other investors, you may be able to sell it at a premium, i.

The Home Depot approach to craftsmanship - simplify it, dumb it down, hire a contractor - is one signal that mastering tools and working with one's hands is receding in America as a hobby, as a valued skill, as a cultural influence that shaped thinking and behavior in vast sections of the country.
As for craftsmanship itself, the issue is how to preserve it as a valued skill in the general population

sentences.en: A man is valued as he makes himself valuable.
